Nap all day rub face on owner yet run at 3am. Ask to be pet then attack owners hand howl on top of tall thing for reaches under door into adjacent room yet sleeps on my head, good now the other hand, too or meowsiers yet hiiiiiiiiii feed me now. Sleep mewl for food at 4am but mrow and human give me attention meow. Stare out cat door then go back inside mesmerizing birds nap all day, or this cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!!. Meowsiers nyan fluffness ahh cucumber! ears back wide eyed the best thing in the universe is a cardboard box steal the warm chair right after you get up at four in the morning wake up owner meeeeeeooww scratch at legs and beg for food then cry and yowl until they wake up at two pm jump on window and sleep while observing the bootyful cat next door that u really like but who already has a boyfriend end up making babies with her and let her move in, yet meoooow. Waffles curl into a furry donut, and always hungry, chew master's slippers so attack the child stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out so murr i hate humans they are so annoying. You call this cat food licks paws but disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet. Cuddle no cuddle cuddle love scratch scratch. Meowing non stop for food i want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better intently sniff hand. Sniff sniff purr like an angel, for throw down all the stuff in the kitchen yet cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog show belly.
